document_name: Decision to declare the Law on Transport Biofuels

document_description: GHG reduction is one of the stated purposes of the Act. The Act is implemented through various regulations and ordinances such as the Regulation on Promotion of Biofuel for Transport 2011 and the Regulation on the conditions and procedure for incentives for the production of biofuels for transport 2011.
